nodes.text: Talravin was one of the planets of the Core Worlds. It was also Bastila and Helena Shan's home planet.

During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, a Rodian thief was burgling the high-security chamber of a casino situated on Talravin. However, he accidentally locked himself inside and broadcasted a holomessage with the promise to share his loot with the saviour.
